Title: Relates to expanding lead testing in water to day care facilities
Summary: Relates to expanding lead testing in water to day care facilities; allows the commissioner to provide financial assistance to those day cares that such testing would pose an unreasonable financial hardship on.
LawCode: Amd ยง1110, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to expanding lead testing to day care facilities
